Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: (\{ (\{ 6, 1 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "As members of the Order, we follow a creed to protect the week and the good hearted. We never harm anyone unless absolutely necessary. We live our lives with honor and virtue. This is our creed." \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "h1", "The Order of the Silver Blade" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "This is the Order of the Silver Blade, an order of true warriors sworn to protect others and live lives of honor and virtue. All members swear an oath to protect the weak and those who need protection as well as live honorable and good lives. Every member is asked to simply do what is right in their heart." \}) \})
(\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "This is the guilds public page. The page has not yet been updated by a guild member." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 4, 1 \}), (\{ "h1", "Code of Conduct" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}), (\{ "text", "1. Your combat abilities are only to be used to defend yourself or others. Any violation of this rule is dishonorable and will result in a dishonorable discharge.\\r\\n\\r\\n2. Any attack due to anger and no just provocation will result in a dishonorable discharge.\\r\\n\\r\\n3. If you break the law and fail to report it to the Constables, you will be dishonorably discharged (and I will ask them if for clarification)." \}) \})
